H0.text: A footpad was a criminal from the 16th to 19th century but what term is used to describe them today. Thief

H1.text: A footpad was a criminal from the 16th to 19th century but what term is used to describe them today. Robber

H2.text: A footpad was a criminal from the 16th to 19th century but what term is used to describe them today. Bandit

H3.text: A footpad was a criminal from the 16th to 19th century but what term is used to describe them today. MUGGER

A5.text: The modern usage—referring to robbery against an individual, often by a group—originated in the 1940s among criminals and police.

A6.text: Mugging is a common term for personal robbery, though personal robbery also encompasses forms of theft such as carjacking.
